project_abstract.cdata: The aim of the Third Industrial Development Project is for the creation of new and the balancing, modernizing and rehabilitation (BMR) of private industrial enterprises, and supporting the implementation of Government policy reforms and institutional strengthening. These objectives will be realized through : (1) mobilizing finance for new investment and BMR of economically viable enterprises; (2) technical assistance and training in the areas of industry, trade, and finance relating to the private sector; and (3) financing of technical assistance to the National Telecommunications Commission (NTC) to establish a regulatory framework for operations of a commercially run communications utility and private telecommunications companies.
